import React, { useState } from 'react' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; function ProductsAdd({ onAdd }) { let history = useHistory(); const [valueInput, setValueInput] = useState({}); const { register, handleSubmit, watch, errors } = useForm(); function onHandleChange(e) { const { name, image, price, Desc, value } = e.target; setValueInput({ ...valueInput, [name]: e.target.value, [image]: e.target.value, [price]: e.target.value, [Desc]: e.target.value, }) } function onSubmit() { onAdd(valueInput); history.push("/admin/products"); } return (
